name: Diaphragm Breathing
description: Use gentle mouth movements to ease speech muscle tension.

name: Muscle Ease
description: Systematically tensing and relaxing muscle groups to reduce tension.

name: Jaw Mobility
description: Start voicing softly and gradually to reduce speech tension.

name: Feared Word Lists
description: Promotes steady breathing and a relaxed rhythm.

name: Tongue Twisters
description: Keep a smooth, connected voice flow while speaking aloud.
